body:
## (Bug Fix) - Bedrock completions with aws_region_name

- Bug: User was passing `aws_region` name to `bedrock/invoke/` and it was not being used 
- Caused because of the recent refactor to base_llm_http_handler 
- Root Cause of this regression: Lack of testing for propagating dynamic `aws_` auth params through litellm.completion 


- Added comprehensive tests `test_dynamic_aws_params_propagation` - it runs the tests through all `aws_` auth params and all aws routes (/invoke, /converse) 

<!-- e.g. "Implement user authentication feature" -->
